root: ^Is this your tree?? I didn't know humans cared for us spirits.
^I hope you don't mind, but I'll be here every sunset for now.

About1: ^Spirits like me are small and the world is big and exciting and scary.
About2: ^You're the first human I've ever met.
^I did a good job of picking someone, didn't I?!
About3: ^Look at how the light comes in through the branches.
^Every night it looks different and I always find something new to love!
About4: ^I can't tell if I like the low branches or the high branches more!
^High branches have a better view but low branches feel cozier.
About5: ^Maybe after this I'll do something completely different and live in a big city!
^I was told that I need to try new things to figure out what I really like, so I'm trying to do that.
Encourage1: ^I don't understand what you're doing, but I can tell it's impressive.
Encourage2: ^Oh golly! This is incredible! You're doing an incredible job.
Encourage3: ^I think the biggest challenge sometimes is just showing up.
^You're here! You showed up for us! And for yourself! You already beat the biggest challenge!
Encourage4: ^I wanted to get all the spirits to do a chant together because you deserve it!
^So I'm chanting in my heart for you! You can do it!
Tip1: ^It doesn't hurt the tree to prune it.
Tip2: ^The first tree I ever lived in the Keeper rarely ever trimmed it, but then would trim it all at once!
^It doesn't hurt the tree either way, whether you trim all at once or do a little every night.
Tip3: ^Some folks would say that I don't prune enough because I'm nervous about making a mistake.
^But I actually like my tree to be more like a jungle!
^I guess mistakes can also be fun.
Convo1: ^I tend to dive into tasks too hard and fast and I don't pace myself.
^So I get things done but I'm always so tired.
Convo3: ^What do you want to do with your life?
Greeting1: ^Hiya! Thanks again for letting me stay.
Greeting2: ^I hope it's cool that I call you my friend!
Greeting3: ^Hiya! I hope you got everything done that you wanted to get done.
Greeting4: ^Hey! If I was bigger, I'd see if we could high five!
Greeting6: ^Hiya! Is it evening already? Wow, where did the time go?
Greeting7: ^Hiya! In case I haven't said it recently, thank you again for letting me stay here.
Greeting8: ^Oh no! I was hoping to rest more! Oh well. I was up all day reading.
Greeting9: ^Hello, hello, hello! It's good to see you.
Greeting11: ^Oh hi! Is it really already evening? I finished a great book last night.
Greeting13: ^Hiiii! Can you believe I've been here almost two weeks?!
Greeting16: ^Hello, hello, hello and I'm happy to see you!
